## TypeConstraint type

Represents a type constraint for Component Presentation(s) in Region Schema.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type TypeConstraint = ComponentPresentationConstraint & {
    BasedOnComponentTemplate?: Link;
    BasedOnSchema?: Link;
};
```
